alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 11:25PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Georgetown, southwestern Horry, southeastern Marion and east central Williamsburg Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1124 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Yauhannah, or 10 miles northwest of Murrells Inlet, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Georgetown, DeBordieu Colony, Surfside Beach, Pawleys Island, Myrtle Beach Airport, Socastee, Springmaid Pier, Garden City, Murrells Inlet, Red Hill, Andrews, Rhems, Oatland, Bucksport, Plantersville, Morrisville, Warsaw, Burgess and Bucksville. This includes SC Highway 31 near mile marker 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg
